## R Markdown

```{r}
gmailAddress <- c(
  "tim@gmail.com",
  "anita",
  "yellen@gmail.com",
  "huang@gmail.com"
)
```

```{r}
for (i in seq_along(gmailAddress)) {
  if (!str_detect(gmailAddress[[i]],"@gmail.com")){
    correctGamilAddress <-str_c(gmailAddress[[i]],"@gmail.com")
    gmailAddress[[i]] <-correctGamilAddress}
  }
```
